rundown: 8-3 W vs Los Angeles Angels Didier Fuentes: 3.2 innings, 2 earned runs, 4 hits, 0 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Matt Olson (3 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 4 RBI) Sean Murphy (1 hit - 3 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a convincing victory over the Los Angeles Angels, showcasing a powerful offensive performance. Key highlights include Matt Olson's standout game with three hits, including a home run and four RBIs, which significantly contributed to the team's run total. Sean Murphy and Jurickson Profar also added to the offensive surge with their own home runs. The Braves' pitching, led by Didier Fuentes, managed to limit the Angels to three runs, solidifying the win. Overall, the combination of strong hitting and effective pitching led to the Braves' success in this matchup.
